title: Do beets really help lower blood pressure? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beetroots are good for lowering high blood pressure. Beetroot contains high levels of dietary nitrate (NO3), which the body converts into biologically active nitrite (NO2) and nitric oxide (NO). In the human body, NO relaxes and dilates blood vessels and improves blood flow. Many researchers have found that inorganic nitrate and beetroot juice supplementation was associated with a significant reduction in systolic blood pressure.
